node.description: Burden filter 2: Filtering with MAF and Fisher test using case/control

setting.name: casesFile
setting.description: Path to a pedigree )containing the names of the CASES. A pedigree file is a text file containing the following columns: FAMILY-ID INDIVIDUAL-ID FATHER-ID(or 0) MOTHER-ID(or 0) SEX(1 male, 2 female, 0 unknown) PHENOTYPE (1 affected, 0 unaffected, 9 not available)

setting.name: controlsFile
setting.description: Path to a pedigree containing the names of the CONTROLS. A pedigree file is a text file containing the following columns: FAMILY-ID INDIVIDUAL-ID FATHER-ID(or 0) MOTHER-ID(or 0) SEX(1 male, 2 female, 0 unknown) PHENOTYPE (1 affected, 0 unaffected, 9 not available)

setting.name: maxMAF
setting.description: if MAF of cases OR MAF of control is greater than maxMAF, the the FILTER Column is Filled

setting.name: minFisherPValue
setting.description: if p-value fisher(case/control vs have alt/have not alt) lower than 'fisher' the the FILTER Column is Filled
